title: 2: S2E02 – “Macabre Manifestations” – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales by Sasha Brokov, Adam Davies, Al Bruno III, and Emerald Lee, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about inhuman visitors, vanishing vehicles, sleepless specters, and manifest imaginations. You’re listening to the standard edition of tonight’s program, which includes the first two stories. If you’d like to show your support and enjoy an extended version of this and or other episodes, with twice the terror, visit SimplyScaryPodcast.com and click “Patrons” in the upper menu to sign up today. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s2e02
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
